title: VmwAROS beta 0.7
description:
WmvAROS beta 0.7 

What AROS is?

The AROS Research Operating System is a lightweight, efficient and flexible desktop operating system, designed to help you make the most of your computer. It\\\\\\\&#039;s an independent, portable and free project, aiming at being compatible with AmigaOS 3.1 at the API level (like Wine, unlike UAE), while improving on it in many areas. The source code is available under an open source license, which allows anyone to freely improve upon it.

[read more at http://aros.sourceforge.net/]

More words: Remember your old Amiga? ;)


Then...


VmwAROS is the AROS environment already installed and configured in a virtual machine. Compatible with any recent VMware product for Windows, Linux and Macintosh.

There`s also a LiveCD - VmwAROS Live! which can run on any PC hardware without virtualisation.
[read more at http://vmwaros.org/]

7-zip (grab free at 7-zip.org) archiver (or compatible, like PeaZIP, WinRAR) and 66+MB RAM is required to unpack the file.

===
Here is a short (and maybe incomplete) changelog from version 0.6:

    * System files updated to march 29th, 2008
    * Preliminary web surfing with Rob\\\\\\\&#039;s Webkit Preview
    * Email support with SimpleMail
    * CD-authoring and ISO creation with FryingPan
    * Easy spot your files with Finder
    * All contributed files moved from Work: root to Extras:
    * New VmwUpdate for easy system updating
    * New ConfigIP with DHCP support for network configuration
    * FTP file sharing with local network or host OS full working again
    * Adapted Murks!IDE v0.5.9 with install script
    * New official VmwAROS desktop wallpapers
    * Vim text editor for old vi fans
    * AROS documentation and VmwAROS manual in PDF
    * New games and applications already installed & configured
    * DHCP running as default: just install and surf the web!

Thanks to the Paolo Besser, the creator of this distro and all the warm AROS community and developers out there! See ya soon.
